unlimitedtrade.gui.title: Unlimited Trade Mod - %s
unlimitedtrade.config.openConfigGui.name: open Config Gui
unlimitedtrade.config.openConfigGui.comm: Set the shortcut key to open the setting interface
unlimitedtrade.config.startTrade.name: startTrade
unlimitedtrade.config.waitChunkDebug.com:
If you need a more stable transaction, please install the ChunkDebug module on the server
 to prevent the transaction from being loaded and causing the transaction to be invalid
unlimitedtrade.config.dropBlockList.name: drop Block List
unlimitedtrade.config.dropBlockList.comm: Limit the type of items that are automatically thrown
unlimitedtrade.config.maxUseRetries.name: Maximum number of post-transaction retries
unlimitedtrade.config.maxUseRetries.comm: Set max post-trade action max attempts
